thread.title: Charming hotel in the bustling St. Germain

author: hancamem
title: Charming hotel in the bustling St. Germain
text:
I travelled with my 2 teen daughters and the small hotel on a quiet street in the very busy St. Germain area was lovely. Location is ideal. We enjoyed our very spacious triple room with beautiful fabric upholstered walls and windows opening to the courtyard below. The pretty outdoor seating area under the chestnut trees (of course!) was great for an afternoon drink. We enjoyed breakfast in the sunny breakfast room very much. Friendly staff, especially when we had a late night request. Our only regret was not being able to stay longer!
